title: Evidence-Based Psychological Intervention Design: Technology-Social Balance Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Psychological Theories and Instructional Design Principles
context.additional_context: Enhancing evidence-based psychological intervention design competencies via team-based collaboration and practice-centered learning in digital environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three types of evidence-based psychological intervention strategies by applying a technology-society balance approach.
Learners can develop and demonstrate personalized intervention programs for target populations in team projects using digital tools.
Learners can perform at least two cycles of iterative feedback to improve the intervention design process based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
